author: jukka
msg: JCR-231: Avoid using the RangedIterator.getSize() method that might return -1.
Made some small cleanups in the getRemoteXxxArray methods.
Moved a part of the code from ServerQueryResult.getRows() up to ServerObject.getRemotRowArray() for consistency.

author: ekoneil
msg: Update the Beehive website for the 1.0 release:
Note, getting the releases/releases-1.0.html download page working required working around a Forrest bug documented here:
The workaround is in build.xml and copies the skin-ed .html files from $FORREST_HOME/main/site
Note, this isn't ready to go live yet.  Should be done with it tomorrow...
